import React from 'react'; import TextField from 'material-ui/TextField'; class SalaryDetails extends React.Component { constructor (props) { super(props); this.state = { holdingAmount: '' }; } componentWillReceiveProps (props) { this.setState({ holdingAmount: props.holdingAmount}); } render () { let fTotalSalary = ''; let fLeaveAllocated = ''; let fApplicableFrom = ''; if (typeof typeof this.props.data !== 'undefined' && typeof this.props.data.test !== 'undefined') { fTotalSalary = this.props.data.test.total_salary; fLeaveAllocated = this.props.data.test.leaves_allocated; fApplicableFrom = this.props.data.test.applicable_from; } return (
{fTotalSalary} Total Salary {fLeaveAllocated} Leaves Allocated {fApplicableFrom} Applicable From
{this.props.data.Basic}
Basic
{this.props.data.EPF}
EPF
{this.props.data.HRA}
HRA
{this.props.data.Loan}
Loan
{this.props.data.Conveyance}
Conveyance
{this.props.data.Advance}
Advance
{this.props.data.Medical_Allowance}
Medical Allowance
{this.props.data.Misc_Deductions}
Misc Deductions
{this.props.data.Special_Allowance}
Special Allowance
{this.props.data.TDS}
TDS
{this.props.data.Arrears}
Arrears
{'Holding Ammount'}
{ this.setState({holdingAmount: evt.target.value}); }} value={this.state.holdingAmount} />
); } } export default SalaryDetails;
